::DarkMouse:

"Good idea. Wait here." 
She ran to the lab and grabbed some tubes and some string.  Next, she 
ran to the kitchen and grabbed a few pieces a fruit and ran back to 
the console.
"OK, Let's try this."  She pulled the string through the tube and put 
a piece of friut to the end of the string.  She laid it on the 
counter and put Akura in front of the fruit.
"OK Twister, you slowly pull the string and we'll see if Akura 
follows it through the tube.  He'll fit though the tube alright.  
Hope this works."  She crossed her fingers.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "ilovealllizards" <ilovealllizards@p...> 
wrote:
> Twister: Hmm....Maybe first to pull ropes and wires through 
tunnles. That
> would be very usefull. *Twister says to DarkMouse*
